caption.p: Prevalence of COVID-19 as of 3 June 2020 (GMT 14:52). The figure shows (a) total cases, (b) total deaths, and (c) the recovery rate per country since the time of the first case of COVID-19. Data were downloaded from worldometers ( https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/) and John Hopkins University (https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19). Graphs were produced using R-studio v3.4.4 and the 'rworldmap' package v1.3-6.
